3: You see darkness once again when you are forcefully disconnected.
But you can hear someone calling for you eagerly in the trembling darkness.
Commandant... Commandant!
Before you realize, the door of the chamber has been removed by force. You see many familiar faces.
Hey, is it just me? Why's Commandant looking kinda spaced out? Could it be the side effects of the connection chamber?

2: I just need some time to recover.

3: I just ran a scan on your basic physical conditions, Commandant, but found nothing unusual...
Looks like you should be alright. Take a good rest, Gray Raven Commandant.
Let's help Commandant out first.
Here.
...It was all because of Cerberus. You don't need to be sorry, Commandant.
Commandant, give me your hand.
There's nothing to be sorry about. Give me your hand, Commandant.
As long as you're safe and sound. And Kamui is back too.
Well, I don't have plans for kicking it in this place. Especially not with some dumbass.
What did you say?!
P-please calm down. I don't think Karenina meant it...
And so the fight starts...
I see... This is how Gray Raven is like. I've got to paint it down.
It's always getting busier and busier when you are around, Commandant.

2: Well, I kind of like it.

3: So do I.
But you always handle everything well.
This is nice.
It's great when everyone comes together, Commandant. I hope we can spend every year, every month, and every holiday like this.
...Yeah.
Vera...
Happy April Fool's Day, Asimov.
Stop digressing. You took the connection chamber out, didn't you? And you let those outside the project know about it.
Does it really matter? I've got the discovery of the century on my hands though. The Gray Raven Commandant can use the remote connection technique almost perfectly.
But you knew that long ago, didn't you?
Stop answering my questions with questions... Whatever, I'd suggest you leave the commandant of Gray Raven alone.
So we aren't authorized to know about it. Is that what you're saying?
Tsk. A boring squad with a commandant like that one.
Don't go yet. I've got something else to tell you.
What is it? Have you finally found a commandant for us?
That's right.
Really?
If the report results are right, you'll soon be able to formally meet a commandant, who can use the remote connection technique 'perfectly.'
Hmph... Haha, great news. Wait, is this an April Fool's joke?
Do I look like someone with such a terrible sense of humor? Get Noctis and 21 back to Babylonia ASAP. You're about to have your final adjustments.
Finally—
